DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect two topical non-steroidal antiinflammatory agent control pain photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) eye surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Bromday Versus Nevanac Eye Drops Control Pain Following Photorefractive Keratectomy
DOC.criteria: male female least 18 year age , ocular study 15 day prior dose , BCVA 20/200 better , return study visit follow instruction investigator staff , self administer test article Ocular inflammation , hypersensitivity bromfenac nepafenac , corneal pathology , radial keratotomy , corneal transplant corneal refractive surgery last two year
